resources.string:
To Use:
1. Enter your weight to the nearest pound in the first box.
2. Enter your height to the nearest inch in the second box
3. Hit Calculate

BMI VALUES:
Underweight: less than 18.5
Normal: between 18.5 and 24.9
Overweight: between 25 and 29.9
Obese: 30 or greater
Zero is not a valid height or weight
Incorrect Entry in either field. Only enter whole numbers above 0
Missing an entry in one of the two fields
